about.text1:
Lotte Center Hanoi will become a new landmark in Hanoi. It will bring a high-quality lifestyle, aiming at impressing not only Vietnam, but the whole world as well.
Lotte Observation Deck is located on the 65th floor of Lotte Center Hanoi as the third tallest building in Vietnam.
Standing at a thrilling height of 272 meters in the air, you can relax your body and immerse yourself in the feeling of pleasant and surprise to enjoy the panoramic view 360 degree Hanoi just in the blink of an eye.
Visitors can sip coffee, shop for souvenirs and admire every aspect of Hanoi's landscapes
about.text2:
The Observatory offers a diverse range of unique experiences that can only be had at a thrilling height of 253 meters in the air, including various exhibitions based on the theme "The Ao Dai of Vietnam,"
a café above the clouds, and exclusive tower-themed souvenirs.
about.text3:
Visitors can see all of the different facets of Hanoi Sky,
ever-changing with the four seasons and time of day.
